settings.title: How long does shipping usually take?
settings.answer: Please allow 3-5 business days for fulfillment. You will receive tracking information via email once your order has shipped.

settings.title: Can I exchange my order for a different size?
settings.answer: Yes, orders can be exchanged up to 30 days after being received. If you would like to exchange your order please email us at help@sosatisfying.co. You will be responsible for shipping the wrong size back to us, and then we will cover the shipping costs on your replacement.

settings.title: Returns and Refunds
settings.answer: You can return your order for a refund up to 30 days after you have received the product. Return shipping costs must be paid by the consumer and your refund will be issued once the product is received back into our warehouse.

settings.title: Other Issues?
settings.answer: Your satisfaction is our number one priority. If you have any questions, issues or concerns please reach out to help@sosatisfying.co
